const fetchHistory=async()=>{try{const res=await fetch("http://localhost:8000/history");const data=await res.json();setHistory(data);}catch(err){console.error("Error fetching history:",err);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchHistory();return()=>{// Clean up on unmount
